alert.note: Alert for Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 9:59PM EST until January 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM WEDNESDAY TO 1 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches. * WHERE...Southwestern St. Lawrence County. * WHEN...From 7 AM Wednesday to 1 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A lake band is expected to enter the area Wednesday morning, and then gradually shift south of the area Wednesday night.
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
